tweet_text: @jmcunning @sterlewine @anthonymiccio @AUgetoffmygold The Metallica factor is almost a separate thing altogether. Mainstream rock stations that played them dabbled in alt-rock (WMMS, where my husband worked at the time, was one) so that's one factor. But the alt/rock lines had started to blur, which you'd see as the '90s wore on.
text_en: The Metallica factor is almost a separate thing altogether. Mainstream rock stations that played them dabbled in alt-rock (WMMS, where my husband worked at the time, was one) so that's one factor. But the alt/rock lines had started to blur, which you'd see as the '90s wore on.

tweet_text: @Beastlyorion People are unaware of these kinds of balances and so hang their hat on single metrics like "tps" or "fast finality" without considering the global perspective. IOHK did something on TPS and the like, really worth a listen if you haven't heard it.
